name: Los Gatos de la Bruja
description:
Hello everyone!

The witch was captured! The cats are not very pleased and will do their best for rescuing her!! A classical generated maze to clean from its monsters before getting to the final stage. Switch from one cat to the other. Two controller’s mode (classic and twin sticks).

Playable with keyboard or gamepad on PC , Mac and Linux (Mac and Linux untested!!).

Game is released in French, English and Spanish but can be extended at will.

Los Gatos de la Bruja is my first completed and published project (one man team as a hobby).

It was designed for and with my little boy, my first and best "Lead Tester"!

Thank you for downloading and playing our game!

HEPARO 2020
